title: 大家能打开littleskin吗
author: 寒冰越愈
txt_content: 大家能打开littleskin吗,我最近一直打不开

replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content:
LittleSkin 域名调整公告：
https://resource.littleservice.c ... domain-changed.html

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
https://resource.littleservice.c ... domain-changed.html
你看看这样能行吗

replies.author: 寒冰越愈
replies.txt_content:
NoName德里奇 发表于 2020-4-3 12:10
LittleSkin 域名调整公告：
https://resource.littleservice.cn/plugins/littleskin/assets/domain-changed ...
可以了,谢谢

replies.author: 泽先生鸭
replies.txt_content: 我可以打开啊，域名调整了吧。
